subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: New American open-wheel era or not, it was business as usual in the IndyCar Series race at Homestead-Miami Speedway in Florida. A Target Chip Ganassi Racing entry, this one driven by the former series champion Scott Dixon, won the season opener for the third straight year. None of the newcomers making the transition from the Champ Car World Series to the newly unified IndyCar series were able to compete with the leaders.
